feed.title: Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:12 p.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 9.6Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 6:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
Temperature: 9.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 9.1°C
Wind: E 12 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 5 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few showers. Low plus 4.
